org.rendersnake

Class CanvasMacros<T extends HtmlCanvas>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rendersnake.CanvasMacros<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class CanvasMacros<T extends HtmlCanvas>
extends Object
    CanvasMacros is a helper class that provides convenience methods for common HTML constructions.
    Author:
    ernest.micklei

    • Method Detail

      • script

        public T script(String code)
                            throws IOException
        Write the script tag with code content. No HTML escaping applied. W3C has recommended that all scripts within an XHTML document be escaped using CDATA sections.
        Parameters:
        code -
        Returns:
        the canvas
        Throws:
        IOException
